channel.title: Regional Sales on videogamesales
channel.description: Recent content in Regional Sales on videogamesales

item.title: Regional Sales of Top 100 Video Games (in millions)
item.description: Regional Sales of Top 100 Video Games (in millions) The plot below shows North America, Europe, Japan and Other Sales of Top 100 Video Games in millions. This is an interactive graph, and with the tabs in the upper right corner, you are free to choose whether to see only Top 100 selling video games in a particular region or the difference in sales of video games with the same ranking in four regions at the same time.
